title: Prescription for glasses or contact lenses in the UK 2014 , by country
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Yes, and No. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Yes had the highest Share of respondents in Country Scotland and No had the lowest Share of respondents in Country Scotland.
Among all the Countrys, No had the highest Share of respondents in Country Wales and lowest Share of respondents in Country Scotland.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for No in Country Wales and Scotland.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Countrys for 2 groups Yes, and No that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Scotland had the maximum Share of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Yes. The minimum Share of respondents was observed in Country Scotland for No.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Yes, and No. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Yes had the highest Share of respondents in Country Scotland and No had the lowest Share of respondents in Country Scotland.
Among all the Countrys, No had the highest Share of respondents in Country Wales and lowest Share of respondents in Country Scotland.
There is a gap of 17.0 between the highest and lowest Share of respondents found for No in Country Wales and Scotland.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of respondents on the Y-axis for 5 different Countrys for 2 groups Yes, and No that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Yes had the highest Share of respondents in Country Scotland and No had the lowest Share of respondents in Country Scotland.
Among all the Countrys, No had the highest Share of respondents in Country Wales and lowest Share of respondents in Country Scotland.
The maximum Share of respondents for No that was found in Country Wales was 2.06 times larger than the minimum Share of respondents observed in Country Scotland.
Among all 2 groups, Yes had the gap of 18.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of respondents observed in Country Scotland and Wales respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Yes, and No, the Country Northern Ireland is the maximum Share of respondents and Wales is the minimum Share of respondents.
